title: Create Navigation and Layout Components
description: Develop navigation components and layout structures including header, sidebar, and footer components

user_stories: As a user, I want consistent navigation so that I can easily move between sections
As a designer, I need a cohesive layout structure so that the UI is professional
business_rules: Navigation must be consistent across all views
Layout components must be responsive and mobile-friendly
Navigation must adapt based on user role and authentication status
Layout components must follow the design system
edge_cases: Handling navigation on mobile devices with limited screen space
Managing navigation state during route changes
Ensuring accessibility compliance for navigation components

acceptance_criteria: Header component displays consistently across all views
Sidebar navigation adapts based on user role
Footer component contains required links and information
Navigation components are responsive and mobile-friendly
Layout components follow the design system

e2e_tests: Navigation flow testing across different user roles
Responsive design testing on various devices

additional_context.technical_notes: Follow Angular best practices for component development. Ensure responsive design for all navigation components. Implement proper state management for navigation elements. Create distinct sidebar components for Customer, Tenant Admin, and System Admin roles, or a single smart component that renders based on user role.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure navigation components don't expose sensitive information about user roles or system structure. Implement proper authorization for displayed navigation items.
